post.ban_reason: Ban evasion. This submission's owner was was banned from Ruqqus on another account.
post.title: Fact is racism is for grade A morons. If you feel you need to "belong" to a race, nation or other ideological spook; it's because you are too WEAK to go it alone. You have low self-esteem and need to be coddled

body:
In terms of nation I have little choice in the matter honestly. I'm an American by virtue of being born here. Have citizenship. A SS card. Etc. I guess I could get rid of some of that - but it'd be awfully impractical to do so and not just end up somewhere else where I got citizenship and more or less repeated the process.

This sounds like some really poorly thought out individualist anarchist take.
body_html:
In terms of nation I have little choice in the matter honestly. I'm an American by virtue of being born here. Have citizenship. A SS card. Etc. I guess I could get rid of some of that - but it'd be awfully impractical to do so and not just end up somewhere else where I got citizenship and more or less repeated the process.

This sounds like some really poorly thought out individualist anarchist take.
